title: Tons of DC and AFk in ranked currently
body: So I'm from OCE, and currently in Silver 4. Have anyone getting teammate that DC and AFK nearly every game, counting from yesterday till now. I've been getting 8/20 game with teammate that afk or DC from the start, problem is that they did log back in around 2 min and then DC again and disable remake. So have I been curse or someone else have these problem.

replies.body:
Perfect way that RIOT can get you to play over and over.  It's been happening for a while now and it comes to a point that AFK is a form of cheating to offer the players a free win, VICEVERSA.

This way players have to spend more time playing LoL.

Makes allot of sense to keep doing the DC and AFK during a promo game etc.

How else are they going to retain their customer base to keep playing over and over because of that "certain" game.  Have you ever notice that the "DC and AFK" mostly ocurr during those important games?

I sure there is some sort of psychology behind the 40mins games with League.

2 cent

Yes rito, same here. Around half of all my games has had DCs and AFKs on either team... in ranked! 
Thanks to that and alot of toxic players (who only seem to ever come out at night or early mornings) i'm now down to s5 and in elo hell .... not that i'm complaining but i'd really appreciate some assistance.
there is a problem going on but i have been hearing it for normal games only :O
